pr_title: fix(iot-dev): Fix cleanup logic in AMQP layer when interrupted during open

timeline.message:
fix(iot-dev): Fix cleanup logic in AMQP layer when interrupted during open

exception should be retryable, and the catch block should close the reactor and shut down the executor service, not just shut down the executor service. Close() covers this well so a call to it from this catch block works well

timeline.bodyText: I am assuming we only want to clean up on close?
timeline.author: barustum

replies.bodyText: The close method already calls executorServicesCleanup, so I'm just delaying it until after the reactor has stopped
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: A proton reactor!? Sounds powerful and dangerous.
timeline.author: drwill-ms

replies.bodyText: It's like we are nuclear physicists or something!
replies.author: timtay-microsoft
